title: News Section added to the main page
content: News feed detailing future changes to the game and site was created, and is now available on the main page.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: News create page created and added the Admin Create Portal
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: New key terms introduced
content: Focus plus X, Focus minus X, Enthusiasm plus X and Enthusiasm minus X have been introduced.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Name changes for Play and Ownership
content: "Play" and "Ownership" will now be named "String" and "Reserve", respectively.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Terms create, edit and details pages created
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: 5 HP is now the main tag of all Endings
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Pointers added to each die result of Endings and cards with modular effects
content: Pointers added to each die result of Endings and cards with modular effects to help players with color blindness discern larger blocks of card text.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Dice roll and damage function added to simulator's chat window
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: The New Challengers and The New Challengers: Limited Release revealed
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Enter the Hero: Gold Release revealed
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Artwork for the Recoil series added
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Simulate button added to deck details pages
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Sound effects added to the Simulator page
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Deck Export for Tabletop Simulator completed
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Stats panel for Deck Builder completed
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Mobile version of CardBase coming soon
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Deck Builder now remembers deck in progress even after leaving the page
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Chat panel added to the Simulator
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Change to Second Wind mechanic
content:
Before: Second Wind lasts the duration of the game.//

After: Second Wind lasts 1 turn.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Tiered HP introduced
content: HP is now tiered. HP is now broken up into 4 tiers with 4 HP each. When a player moves into a new tier, the highest amount of HP in that tier is the new maximum HP for that player.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: True damage type introduced
content: The card effect "ignore the reactions of defending Fighter(s)" will be replaced with the True damage type.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Changes to starting HP
content: Starting HP is now based on total number of players. Starting HP gain 4 for each player.
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Effect change for key term Reset
content: The key word Reset has been changed from "you can resolve the extra effects of 1 X one more time" to "you can resolve the effects of 1 Item in your Reserve one more time".
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: Artwork for The Spider series added
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: The Steam Workshop on Tabletop Simulator for PlayMaker is up
content:
The Steam Workshop on Tabletop Simulator for PlayMaker is up.

You can follow the link here to download:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2959625751
author: 64ecc30f82c5729f0b36e158

title: News model converted to an Article model
author: TeamPlayMaker
content: The news model for the site has been changed to an article model.  Article create page created and all news instances have been converted into articles.

title: Hit tag effect change
author: TeamPlayMaker
content: The hit tag effect has been changed.// Previous effect://If this card is not defending and has not resolved its main effect, deal 1 damage to a foe. You can not defend with or resolve the main effect of this card for the rest of the round.//New effect://If this card has not resolved its main effect, deal 1 damage to a foe. You can not resolve the main effect of this card for the rest of the round.

title: Article Pages are up
author: TeamPlayMaker
content: The each article and news item with more than a headline will a full page. If an article has more information it will now be clickable.

title: Card changes 2/11 - 2/17
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Changes in card effects:@@]]//
Feza of the Black Winds]]//
Previous: <Trigger> When a card in foe's String is resolving, the effect text of that foe's Fighter or Aura becomes the following: ● Discard up to 1 card from your hand; 1 foe whose String has a Magic card(s) discards 1 card in their String.//
New: <Trigger> When a card in foe's String is resolving, the effect text of that foe's Fighter or Aura becomes the following: ● Discard 1 card from your hand, then 1 foe whose String has a Magic card(s) discards 1 card in their String.//
Final Attack: One Ton Wingbeat!!!]]//
"<Trigger> If this card is discarded from your String, deal 2 damage to a foe." added.//
Series changes:@@]]//
"Gimza", "Master of Shadows!", "Shadow Strike!!", "Karmic Crash!!!", "Old Collar" and "Shadow Clone" have been added to the Quest series.

title: Card changes 2/4 - 2/10
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Changes in card effects:@@]]//

Taxonomy Above All Orders]]//
Previous: Reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time).//
New: <Unity> Reset 1 Item (you can resolve the effects of 1 Item in your Reserve one more time).//

Mirror Plant!!]]//
Previous: ● Return 2 cards from your hand to the top of the Main deck in any order; resolve your Fighter and reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time).//
New: ● Return 2 cards from your hand to the top of the Main deck in any order; resolve your Fighter and reset 1 Item (you can resolve the effects of 1 Item in your Reserve one more time).//

"Hau, Scout Ahead!"]]//
Previous: Focus plus 3 and reset 1 of your Pluck.//
New: Focus plus 3 and reset 1 Item.//

Hammerspace]]//
Previous: If your String has a Canny card(s), reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time).//
New: If your String has a Canny card(s), reset 1 Item (you can resolve the effects of 1 Item in your Reserve one more time).//

Hive]]//
Previous: <Event> Reset 1 of your Pluck.//
New: <Event> Reset 1 Item.//

Stinger Tornado!!!]]//
Previous: <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time).//
New: <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Reset 1 Item (you can resolve the effects of 1 Item in your Reserve one more time).//

Series changes:@@]]//
"Peaceful Mediation" have been added to the Mystic series and removed from the Brawler series.

title: Card Changes 1/28 - 2/3
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Changes in card effects:@@]]//
Gizma]]//
Previous: Resolve the main effect of 1 Fighter, Aura or Move in your placed cards, then discard it.//
New: Resolve the main effect of 1 card in your placed cards, then discard it.//

title: Card changes 9/24 - 9/30
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Changes in card effects:@@]]//

Swift Guard!!]]//
Previous: <1-5> No effect.//
New: <1-5> Deal 2 damage.//

Double Wall Blowback!!!]]//
Previous: <1-5> Deal 2 damage.//
New: <1-5> Deal 3 damage.//

Gold Frag]]//
Previous: <L. Trigger> When a Fighter in your play is revealed, that Fighter gains 1 HP.//
New: <L. Trigger> When this Item is played or a Fighter(s) in your play is revealed, 1 Fighter in your play gains 1 HP (that card is revealed).//

Dual Wing Strike!!]]//
Previous: <1-5> Deal 2 damage. <6-11> Deal 2 damage. Draw 1 card. <12+> Deal 2 damage plus 1 additional damage for each card in your play past 4. Add 1 Unity card from the discard pile to your hand.//
New: <1-5> Deal 1 damage. <6-11> Deal 2 damage. Add 1 Unity Move from your hand to your play, that card can not be resolved this round. <12+> Deal 2 damage. Add 1 Unity Move from your hand to your play.//

Dive Bomber Finisher!!!]]//
Previous: <1-5> Deal 1 damage.//
New: <1-5> Deal 2 damage.//

Thermodynamic Break!!!]]//
Previous: <1-5> Deal 1 damage.//
New: <1-5> Deal 2 damage.//

Pitch - Swift Rending!!!]]//
Previous: <1-5> No effect.//
New: <1-5> Deal 2 damage.//

Returning Souls]]//
Previous: <Critical> Discard 2 cards from your play; add 1 Aura from the discard pile to your play.//
New: <Critical> Discard 1 unresolved card from your play; add 1 Aura or Move from the discard pile to your play.//

Rekindled]]//
Previous: If a player(s) has a Power card(s) in their play, gain 2 HP.//
New: If a player(s) has a Power card(s) in their play, gain 1 HP.//

Ignition Left!!]]//
Previous: <6-11> Deal 3 piercing damage. <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s) and draw 1 card.//
New: <6-11> Deal 3 piercing damage. Draw 1 card. <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s) and draw 2 cards.//

Big Bang Right!!!]]//
Previous: <6-11> Discard 1 card from your hand. <12+>  If your hand has 6 or more cards, deal 6 piercing damage. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s).//
New: <6-11> Deal 2 piercing damage. <12+>  Deal 3 piercing damage. If your hand has 6 or more cards, deal 3 additional piercing damage. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s).//

title: Card changes 10/1 - 10/7
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Changes in card effects:@@]]//
Strength Training Manual]]//
Previous://
Discard this Item; your Fighter gains 2 HP.//
New://
Discard this Item; deal 1 damage to a foe.//

Battle Girl Alice]]//
Previous://
This card gains Counter 1.//
New://
Select 1 foe; that foe must resolve their Ending this round with you as the target (other players can still be targeted).//

The Survey Crew]]//
Previous://
<Critical> Return 1 card from the discard pile to the top of the Main deck.//
New://
<Critical> Return 2 cards from the discard pile to the top of the Main deck.//

An Opening to Their Blindspot]]//
Previous://
<Limited> If you have a Canny Fighter in your play, deal 1 bypassing damage to a foe.//
New://
<Limited> If you have a Canny card(s) in your play, deal 1 bypassing damage to a foe.//

Ground Collapse]]//
Previous://
Reduce the focus of all foes by 2. If they have Enthusiasm lower than yours, reduce it by 4 instead.//
New://
Foes with Enthusiasm lower than yours have their Focus reduced by 4 and must resolve their Endings in this round.//

Old Playbook]]//
Previous://
Discard this Item; reveal 2 cards in a foe's play.//
New://
Discard this Item; add 1 Aura or Move from the discard pile to your hand, then discard 1 card from your hand.//

Battle Girl Transformation]]//
Previous://
<> Draw 1 Pluck.//
New://
<> This card copies the effect text of your Fighter.//

Rallying Cry]]//
Previous://
<C. Trigger> At the start of the round or during a foe’s turn, add 8 to your Enthusiasm.//
New://
<Critical> If you have no Fighter in your play, add 1 Staunch Fighter from your hand to your play.//

The Star-Cat Alliance]]//
Previous://
<Trigger> At the start of a round, gain 1 HP and add 2 to your Enthusiasm. <C. Trigger> At the start of a foe's turn, deal 1 damage to that foe if they have Enthusiasm lower than yours.//
New://
<Trigger> During the Start Phase, if you have the highest enthusiasm, add 2 to your Focus. <C. Trigger> At the start of a foe's turn, deal 2 damage to that foe if they have Enthusiasm lower than yours.//

Bull in a China Shop]]//
Previous://
<Trigger> At the start of the round or during a player’s turn, deal 1 damage to a random foe each time a card(s) is discarded from your hand or removed from your play this round.//
New://
<Trigger> During the Start Phase or during a player’s turn, deal 1 damage to a foe each time a card(s) is discarded from your hand or removed from your play this round.//

title: New cards 10/8 - 10/14
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Chakras Aligned@@]]//
Hero ID and Card Number:]]//GEN 1127//
Type:]]//Event//
Tag:]]//Max 1//
Series]]://Mystic, Quest and Relaxation//
Effect]]:// Return 8 Mystic cards or pluck with different names from their respective discard piles to the bottom of your Main deck/Pluck deck in any order; all Mystic cards in your play gain damage plus 1 this round (those cards deal 1 additional damage at the end of their resolutions).//

Lucky Punch@@]]//
Hero ID and Card Number:]]//GEN 1128//
Type:]]//Event//
Tag:]]//Max 1//
Series]]://Brawler and Magic//
Effect]]:// Discard 7 Pluck in your ownership; deal 5 piercing damage to a foe and ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s). Trigger effects can not be used in response to this Event.//

title: Key term Start Phase introduced
author: TeamPlayMaker
content: All text referring to the start of the round will replaced with "During the Start Phase".

title: Card changes 10/15 - 10/21
author: TeamPlayMaker
content:
Changes in card effects:@@]]//
PantheraMan]]//
Previous: Deal 2 damage to a foe who has yet to go this round. If you are first to go this round or you have the highest Enthusiasm, draw 1 Pluck and gain 1 HP.//
New: If you are first to go this round or you have the highest Enthusiasm, resolve 1 of the following effects: ● Deal 2 piercing damage to a foe. ● Gain 1 HP and draw 1 Pluck.//

Black Claw Divide!!!]]//
Previous: <Target> Foe who has yet to go this round. <12+> Deal 4 piercing damage. The next player's Move(s) and Ending(s) gain damage minus 1 (damage dealt by those cards is reduced by 1 at the end of their resolutions).//
New: <Target> Foe who has yet to go this round. If you have the highest Enthusiasm, target a foe of your choice instead. <12+> Deal 4 piercing damage. The next player's Move and Ending gain damage minus 1 (damage dealt by those cards is reduced by 1 at the end of their resolutions//

Max Reverb!!!]]//
Previous: If you are at 5 HP or less, ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s).//
New: If you are at critical HP, ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s) and reduce damage you take this round by 1.//

Heavy Aura!]]//
Previous: Foes with Enthusiasm lower than yours take 1 damage after resolving an Aura(s) or drawing a card(s).//
New: Foes with Enthusiasm lower than yours take 1 damage after resolving an Aura(s) or adding card(s) to their hands.//
